post:
Choose MyRootPW to become your web hosting partner. 
The Shared Web-Hosting Offers take resources on a powerful servers with
SSD-Disks and are managed by the state of the art Control-Panel.

You will get 99.9% uptime guaranteed, Free LetsEncrypt SSL Certificates, 
1 Click-Wordpress Installations and more!

Choose between the USA, Netherlands and Austria Locations! Starting at only 10 Euro per Year!


# Today there are three things to all of you to enjoy.

**1 - New Location: US** Now MyRootPW is present in the United States!

**2 - Discount** So let us celebrate the third location with a discount!
> 33.3 % OFF Your First YEAR!
> 
> Promotional **Code**: **WelcomeToTheUSA2021**

**3 - Plan Upgrades!**
Your voice/feedback has been heard!The Regular and Large Plans have received updates to the amount of included databases (this has also been applied to the current customers)!
>Medium plans now have 3 MySQL Databases (up from 2)
> Large plans now have 5 MySQL and 5 PostgreSQL Databases (up from 3)

# Web-Hosting Plans:

**Small**
**5 GB SSD** Storage
50 GB Traffic
5 User Accounts
1 MySQL Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 1 Website
=> Order this hosting Package: [10 Euro / Year](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/SmallHosting/?group_id=19&pricing_id=165&coupon=WelcomeToTheUSA2021 "10 Euro / Year")


**Medium**
**15 GB SSD** Storage
100 GB Traffic
10 User Accounts
3 MySQL Databases
1 PostgreSQL Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 5 Websites
=> Order this hosting Package:[ **20 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/RegularHosting/?group_id=20&pricing_id=164&coupon=WelcomeToTheUSA2021 " **20 Euro / Year**")

**Large**
**30 GB SSD** Storage
200 GB Traffic
25 User Accounts
5 MySQL Databases
5 PostgreSQL Database
Free SSL (Letsencrypt)
Host 10 Websites
=> Order this hosting Package: [**40 Euro / Year**](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/LargeHosting/?group_id=21&pricing_id=163&coupon=WelcomeToTheUSA2021 "**40 Euro / Year**")

_All prices excl. VAT if applicable.
Offer valid until 15th of May 2021_

[Compare Plans - on the Website](https://myroot.pw/hosting.php#showplans "Compare Plans - on the Website")
